item.title: Click here!
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

public void createNewTileObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType) { outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60); outStream.writeByte(y - (mapRegionY*8)); // objectYPos outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX*8)); // objectXPos outStream.writeByte(151); // objectCreate outStream.writeByteS(0); // objectDistanceOffset outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID); // objectID outStream.writeByteA(orientation); // objectDirection outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); flushOutStream(); } [br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 05:01:11 PM[/size][hr]add that under public void createNewTileObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)
make sure you put the { and } things for the start and finish of it.

Try it… see if that works ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 05:02:51 PM[/size][hr]Dont worrie about the box things they are just spaces DO NOT ADD THEM[br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 05:05:01 PM[/size][hr]and make sure you change the public void name to public void createNewTileObject1(in x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)

Read full topic
